summary: An ordinance accepting a permit from the Oregon and Washington Railroad Company to construct, maintain and operate across and underneath a portion of "Unplatted Reserve A" in Gilman's Addition to the City of Seattle, and a portion of Lot 21, Block 6, Seattle Tide Lands, a 72-inch trunk sewer pipeline to be known as the Ballard Trunk Sewer, and authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to sign the same.
